```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F)
```

This is my focuses on evictions in San Francisco. The dataset 
contains `r num_evictions` of eviction notices.

##Zip code analysis 
Here is a table of the 10 zip codes with the highest number of 
evictions 


```{r}
kable(by_zip, col.names = c("Zip Code", "Number of Evictions"))
```
